function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants discussing life during lockdown and proposing improvements could lead to the spread of unverified advice or misinformation related to disease prevention.","Impact":"Increased risk of people following unverified advice that could lead to health hazards or worsen the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement guidelines for fact-checking and verifying advice before sharing, and promote official health organizations' recommendations.","Technologies":"Online fact-checking tools, social media monitoring algorithms.","People":"Participants, general public.","Owner":"Health organizations, community leaders."},{"Description":"Joint analysis from different perspectives could lead to overlooking specific health and safety risks associated with contagious diseases.","Impact":"Missed identification of critical health and safety risks that could contribute to disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Include public health experts in joint analyses and ensure the consideration of health and safety implications.","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data analysis tools.","People":"Analysts, researchers, public health experts.","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Acceptance and normalization of the current situation may lead to reduced adherence to disease prevention measures and guidelines.","Impact":"Decreased compliance with safety measures, leading to an increased risk of disease transmission and spread.","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of continued adherence to safety measures, provide mental health support, and communicate the evolving nature of disease prevention strategies.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, telehealth solutions.","People":"General public, mental health professionals.","Owner":"Health authorities, mental health organizations."}]}
